availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in 1826 in Kentucky. Merchant. Married to Carida McClish. Children included Robert, William, and Celera. Died on November 6, 1880 in Louisville.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Third Ward, p. 78; "Kentucky Deaths and Burials, 1843-1970," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:FWYS-SZK : 4 December 2014), W. H. Mcclish, Nov 1880; citing reference pg 184; FHL microfilm 2,046,979.
